message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $11,500. It's a great deal, and I'm sure you'll find it very valuable. Let me know what you think!
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product, but I am looking to keep my spending within a certain budget. Would you consider selling the product for $11,000?

Bob, I understand your budget constraints. I'm willing to come down a little further to $11,250. This reflects the value of the product while still allowing me to get a fair price.  Let me know if you're interested.

I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value of the product and my budget constraints, I would like to propose a price of $11,000. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
